scripts.watch:wasm: cd wasm && cargo watch -s "npm run build:wasm"
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm:prod && tsc && vite build
scripts.build:wasm: cd wasm && RUSTFLAGS="$npm_package_config_rust_flags" rustup run nightly wasm-pack build --dev $npm_package_config_wasm_args
scripts.build:wasm:prod: cd wasm && RUSTFLAGS="$npm_package_config_rust_flags" rustup run nightly wasm-pack build --release $npm_package_config_wasm_args
